body.p: Python supports various operators such as arithmetic, comparison, logical, assignment, and more. Operators are symbols that perform operations on operands.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: # Example of operators x = 10 y = 3 result = x + y # Addition result = x - y # Subtraction result = x * y # Multiplication result = x / y # Division result = x % y # Modulus result = x ** y # Exponentiation
